BR_text.BRdescription:
I used to be able to do a shipping package and create an executable file - I just pulled the repo, and now I'm not able to package the environment. I get the following error;
 <denchmark-code>

 ERROR: UBT ERROR: Failed to produce item: C:\airsim\Unreal\Environments\Blocks\Plugins\AirSim\Binaries\Win64\UE4-AirSim.lib
